function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of synchronization between scientific representation and social meaning","Impact":"Miscommunication and misunderstanding between scientific and social communities, leading to ineffective responses to climate change","Mitigation":"Integration of local ecological knowledge and Indigenous wisdom into scientific frameworks, and effective communication strategies between scientists and local communities","Technologies":"Communication technologies for virtual meetings and conferences, knowledge-sharing platforms","People":"Scientists, local communities, policy makers","Owner":"Scientists, policy makers, community leaders"},{"Description":"Ambiguity and overlap in top-down and bottom-up approaches","Impact":"Confusion and inefficiency in decision-making and project implementation in the built environment","Mitigation":"Clear delineation of roles and responsibilities, and effective communication channels between different levels of decision-making","Technologies":"Project management software, communication platforms for stakeholders","People":"Decision makers, project managers, community leaders","Owner":"Decision makers, project managers, community leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of clear distinction in the production of the built environment","Impact":"Uncoordinated and conflicting actions and decisions at different scales, leading to suboptimal project outcomes","Mitigation":"Standardized guidelines and frameworks for decision-making at different scales, and transparent communication channels between participants","Technologies":"Building information modeling (BIM) software, virtual collaboration tools","People":"Architects, engineers, planners, developers","Owner":"Professional associations, regulatory bodies, project managers"}]}
